languages.text: Deals <u>(from 10 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and blinds enemies for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −10 penalty.
languages.original_text: Наносит <u>(от 10 до 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетического урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 40%. Противники выполняют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} со штрафом −10 и в случае провала оказываются ослеплены на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Deals 15-30 Energy damage with 10 armour penetration within the area and blinds targets for 2 rounds if they fail the Toughness test.
Deals 15-30 energy damage within the area and blinds targets for 2 rounds if they fail a Toughness test. This attack has 10 amour penetration.
Deals 15-30 energy damage within the area and blinds targets for 2 rounds if they fail a Toughness test. This attack has 10 amour penetration.

languages.text: Наносит <u>(от 10 до 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетического урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 40%. languages.original_text: Deals 15-30 energy damage within the area and blinds targets for 2 rounds if they fail a Toughness test. This attack has 10 amour penetration.

traits.locale_text: Наносит 15–30 энергетического урона по области и ослепляет цели на 2 раунда в случае провала проверки Выносливости. Пробитие брони составляет 10%.
Наносит 15–30 энергетического урона по области и ослепляет цели на 2 раунда в случае провала проверки Выносливости. Пробитие брони составляет 10%.

languages.text: 对目标区域造成<u>10-20</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}，此次攻击拥有40%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。所有受影响的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，未能通过检定的目标会被致盲2{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。
languages.original_text: Deals <u>(from 10 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and blinds enemies for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 对目标区域造成15-30点{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}，未能通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}的目标会被致盲两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此次攻击获得10点护甲穿透。

languages.text: Inflige <u>(de 10 a 20)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}daño de energía{/g} con 40 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} y ciega a los enemigos durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnos{/g} a no ser que superen una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10.
languages.original_text: Deals <u>(from 10 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and blinds enemies for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Inflige 15–30 de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}daño de energía{/g} en el área y ciega a los objetivos durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} si fallan una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} . Este ataque tiene 10 de penetración de armadura.

languages.text: 40%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ<u>(10～20)</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}を与えて、敵が−10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}がある{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗した場合、敵を2{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、盲目状態にする。
languages.original_text: Deals <u>(from 10 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and blinds enemies for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 範囲内に15-30の{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}を与え、ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}タフネス{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗した場合、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、盲目状態にする。この攻撃のアーマー貫通は10。

languages.text: Fügt <u>(von 10 bis 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g} mit 40 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} zu und blendet Feinde für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Züge{/g}, falls sie eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 nicht bestehen.
languages.original_text: Deals <u>(from 10 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and blinds enemies for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Fügt im Bereich 15–30 {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g} zu und blendet Ziele für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g}, falls sie eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} nicht bestehen. Dieser Angriff hat eine Rüstungsdurchdringung von 10.

languages.text: Inflige <u>(de 10 à 20)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} avec 40 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} et aveugle les ennemis pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g} s'ils échouent à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test de résistance{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10.
languages.original_text: Deals <u>(from 10 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and blinds enemies for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Inflige 15 à 30 points de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} dans la zone et aveugle les cibles pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} si elles échouent au {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}. Cette attaque s'accompagne de 10 de pénétration d'armure.
